nodes.text: The Resistance Camp was a camp maintained by the Resistance on the garbage planet of Anoat sometime after the Battle of Crait. While at the camp, Lieutenant Kaydel Ko Connix received a general transmission from Tah'Nuhna, which alerted her of the First Order's attack on the planet, which resulted in the base's destruction. She then proceeded to go and inform General Leia Organa.
